response.overview: From the posh hotels of Rodeo Drive to the seedy motels of Santa Monica Boulevard the boys of Beverly Hills are working hard for the money... giving the rich, jaded women of LA. the kind of deep, hard physical training sessions they can only get between the sheets... that one on one, work that ass endorphin rush that comes from young stud with all the right muscles in all the right places, a desire to satisfy and the endurance of a Ferrari to keep Mrs. Beverly Hills calling for more.
response.title: Gigolo
